tool_description: Monitors application and system memory usage patterns during load testing to identify memory leaks and optimization opportunities.

error_messages: Process not found: One or more specified process names could not be found

monitor_session_id.description: Unique identifier for this monitoring session

avg_memory_usage_mb.description: Average memory usage across all processes in MB

peak_memory_usage_mb.description: Peak memory usage observed in MB

memory_leak_detected.description: Whether potential memory leaks were detected
